long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless Close integration with LinkedIn

LinkMatch Chrome extension for Close (former Close.io) automatically shows which LinkedIn profiles(persons and companies) are in your Close database.

So you don't have to manually check the LinkedIn profiles anymore, you can just  connect with new leads right away.

Also, LinkMatch allows to save, view and edit the profile info of the existed Close profiles right in the LinkedIn, without switching to the CRM tab.

------
Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn launched to show notification if needed

- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.close.com/* - to be able to make requests to Close API
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
